definition: Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat
ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome

sentences.english: Niu Gensheng, a former Yili employee, founded Mengniu in 1999.
sentences.chinese: 前伊利僱員牛根生，在1999年創立蒙牛集團。

sentences.english: The contest is officially the "Mongolian Cow Sour Yogurt Super Girl Contest."
sentences.chinese: 大賽的正式名稱是“蒙牛酸酸乳超級女聲大賽”。

sentences.english: I, on behalf of the management team of Mengniu, apologize to our shareholders, " Yao Tangshan, executive director and chief financial officer, said yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 蒙牛集團執行董事及首席財務官姚同山昨日對外表示。

sentences.english: Mengniu and Yili are now each other's biggest competitor.
sentences.chinese: 目前蒙牛和伊利已經成爲最大的互相競爭者。

sentences.english: In Mengniu Group, corporate culture is emphasized all the time.
sentences.chinese: 論文進一步分析了蒙牛集團的企業文化。

sentences.english: By increasing the number of mega pastures it controls, the company intends to expand raw milk production.
sentences.chinese: 蒙牛通過增加名下大型牧場的數量來擴大原奶產能。

sentences.english: Hoodwinks the cow also to have the advantage happy company whole world model chemical plant.
sentences.chinese: 蒙牛還擁有利樂公司全球樣板化工廠。

sentences.english: The first part focuses on the basic situation of Mengniu Dairy Group.
sentences.chinese: 第一局部重點引見了蒙牛乳業集團的根本狀況。

definition: general term for milk packaged for the consumer, including long-life (UHT) milk, pasteurized milk and reconstituted milk
